text: (Is not He (best) who answereth the wronged one) in his distress (when he crieth unto Him) to drive away his misfortune (and removeth the evil) by removing misfortunes, (and hath made you vicegerents of the earth) the dwellers of the earth after the destruction of its people? (Is there any God beside Allah) who did this? (Little do they reflect!) they derive no admonition at all from this.
